_source.text: A. A CPI less than one indicates that cost performance is better than expected B. A CPI greater than one indicates that cost performance is better than expected C. A negative CPI indicates that cost performance is better than expected D. A positive CPI indicates that cost performance is better than expected Answer: B Question 185 You are currently the project manager for a software development project, developing a next generation data-mining tool.
